title: Marie Buck's neighborhood says goodbye
maintext:
By Stephanie Farr, STAFF WRITER
Young families and old couples sat shoulder-to-shoulder next to men in work boots and women in dress suits Friday at the packed funeral for beloved South Philly grocer Marie Buck, 81, who was brutally slain at her corner store Christmas Eve.
The hundreds of mourners who attended Buckâ€™s funeral and packed the pews at St. Mary Magdalen de Pazzi Church on the 700 block of Montrose Street were a testament to how many people Buck touched in her personal life and her community, where she ran her corner store for 44 years.
Continue reading on Philly.com
http://www.philly.com/philly/news/20161231_Marie_Buck_s_neighborhood_says_goodbye.html
